name: Flying Metal
description:
Your city is under attack !!! Save it from total alien invasion, but watch out not to kill everyone in your wake...

Pilot your fighter jet between buildings and kill everyone ;-)

CONTROLS:

WASD - Controls the plane
Mouse Left - Machine Gun
Mouse Right - Missiles !!!

CREDITS:

Quentin Bellay - Designer / Developer
Jason Hein - Developer
Thomas Pryde - Developer / 3D Artist

Music: "Road of Resistance" by BABYMETAL (8 bit ified to the max !!!)

DISCLAIMER:

Game created during OJam 2015.
